title: Episode 23: Molly Bloom
itunes:title: Episode 23: Molly Bloom
description: Molly Bloom joins Sasha for this week's conversation. Molly shares her story from competitive skier to running an underground high stakes poker game. Sasha and Molly talk about how being an athlete and suffering career-ending injuries shaped each of the incredible highs and lows in Molly's life. She also explains her decision to share her life story, eventually becoming the popular movie Molly's Game.
author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
